sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கெடு, அவமாக்கு, ஒழிந்துபோ, அழிந்துபோ, பரிகரி, நீக்கு, வியர்த்தமாக்கு
1. to render idle, unemployed, inactive, inoperative
2. to cause to cease, put an end to, do away with, annul, abolish

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G2596 and G691; to be (render) entirely idle (useless), literally or figuratively: - abolish, cease, cumber, deliver, destroy, do away, become (make) of no (none, without) effect, fail, loose, bring (come) to nought, put away (down), vanish away, make void.
Cognate: G2673, G691, G692
